Grouped_Utterances: I think I need to work on setting boundaries. Sometimes I feel pressured to be “on” all the time. I think I need to communicate that I need some quiet time, especially during busy family events.

Hi! It went pretty well. I managed to meditate a few nights, and I used the grounding exercise when I felt anxious. It was a little challenging at first, but I think I’m getting the hang of it. I felt more relaxed afterward. Yes, I used it when I was in a crowded store. It helped me refocus and calm down. Not really new ones, but I felt a bit anxious during a family gathering. It was a bit overwhelming.
Yeah, I think I slept a bit better. I still woke up a few times, but I felt more rested overall.
I felt much better. I was able to rejoin the gathering without feeling too overwhelmed.

I tried to step outside for a few minutes to breathe and collect my thoughts. It helped a lot. I could talk to them before the next gathering and explain that I might need to step away for a bit. Okay. "Hey everyone, I just wanted to let you know that I love spending time with you all, but sometimes I feel a bit overwhelmed in large groups." I could say, "I might need to take a short break during the gathering to recharge, and I hope you understand."
